Playaudio

This module provides a tkinter frame to use to play audio files. Credit goes to the Github repository: audioplayer

class Audio(parent: Frame, controller: Tk)[source]

Bases: Frame

A tkinter frame to play audio files.

Tipp: for the window use width=270 and height=140.

changevolume(delta)[source]

Change the volume of the played audio.

load()[source]

Load a audio file.

play()[source]

Start playback.

stop()[source]

Stop playback.

tooglepause()[source]

Pause playback.
